competitors.description: Laid-back chain with budget-friendly tacos, happy hours, and beer specials.

weather.forecastSummary: Mild winter week ahead with highs in the mid-50s and no precipitation expected.
weather.impactOnBusiness: Favorable for drive-thru and patio seating; encourages casual outings.
weather.recommendation: Promote outdoor seating and quick-service specials to capitalize on pleasant weather.

yourBusiness.reviewSummary: Strong praise for fresh tortillas, value meals, and drive-thru efficiency; average rating ~4.2/5 across Google, Facebook, and Yelp.
yourBusiness.socialMediaSummary: Positive mentions on local Reddit and Facebook for consistency and speed.
sampleQuotes: Great lunch deal but busy at noon.

competitors.reviewSummary: Liked for variety and late hours but criticism on food consistency.
High praise for creative flavors and vibe; average ~4.5/5.
Appreciated for affordability and happy hours.

actionableInsight.executiveSummary: Rosa's Café maintains solid local positioning with strong value perception, though peak-hour waits are a recurring concern. Mild weather and recent community events present immediate traffic opportunities.
risks: Losing younger customers to trendier competitors like Velvet Taco
Traffic dips if weather turns colder later in week
recommendedActions: Launch short-term Facebook/Instagram geo-fenced ads promoting fajita specials and express ordering.
Partner with Guitars & Growlers for receipt-based discounts to drive evening traffic.
Respond promptly to wait-time reviews and test app-based ordering incentives.
actionableInsight.competitivePosition: Strong value leader among traditional Tex-Mex options; opportunity to close gap with trendier competitors via targeted promotions.
nextSteps: Monitor ad performance over next 7 days
Reach out to local venues for cross-promo
